discussion.p: I think we have an issue with the specification of some of the standard exception types. In particular, several of them have default constructors with remarks to the effect that "The result of calling what() on the newly constructed object is implementation-defined". (In some cases this is contradictory to a further specification of what(), which is specified to return an implementation-defined NTBS.)
